candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (6 votes): groq: As a Bitcoin mining stock, RIOT follows crypto cycles and exhibits high volatility, similar to MARA. Ideal for mean reversion trading as it tends to snap back during bullish crypto rotations, with strong retail interest amplifying moves.
